SELECT B.*, E.EMP_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( select * from emp_brd
where eb_pub = 'Y' and rownum <=3

WITH ATCH_FILE_VIEW AS( SELECT * FROM ATCH_FILE INNER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL USING (ATCH_FILE_ID) ) SELECT EB_NO, EB_TITLE, EB_CONTENT, EB_IMG, EB_CRT_DT, EB_UPD_DT, EB_VWS, EB_PUB, EB_ATCH_FILE, EB.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NM , ATCH_FILE_ID, FI_SN, FI_COURS , FI_EXTSN, FI_ORIGIN_NM, FI_NM , FI_SIZE, FI_MIME , CREAT_DT, USE_AT FROM EMP_BRD EB LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE_VIEW ON (EB_ATCH_FILE = ATCH_FILE_ID) INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE EMP ON EB.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO WHERE EB_NO = #{ebNo}
